Patients randomly assign NTX ( 100mg/d ) placebo combine one two psychotherapy condition ( RP RP +CMP ) . Following standardized consent intake procedure patient participate 12-week trial thrice weekly visit . Manual-guided RP therapy deliver weekly 60-minute individual session . CMP base cocaine-negative urine screen negative breath alcohol test . Follow-up assessment conduct 3 6 month treatment .
